column5: Well our plans have been scrapped for heading to Ivanhoe.. My wifes grandmother has been in ICU for awhile now... and they do not expect she will be coming out (she has contracted C.Difficile while in hospital)... So needless to say heading 12 hours north is off the books.. We were to head up with my Inlaws... and would not go without them.  But it has been decided that since the week is still booked as vacation we will still go albeit closer to home...  That said we have booked with Lakair for the above week.. We will be camping (As my son LOVES it!)  If any other families are interested in a weeks vacation @ Lakair please chime in! Cost to camp is 10.00 a day per adult... While my wife likes to fish, having a 2 year old takes up alot of her time... So she would like to have someone to chat with or go site seeing/shopping with while the boys are out fishing   I have a boat with all the toys, So if you're boatless but still want to bring the family out for a fishing adventure this is you're opportunity!  Just thought I would throw this out there...   G

I'm not sure I want to be in a boat with a nasty stain on it Gerritt....LOL.  That's a great offer...wish I could take the time off, or I'd bring Carole and the kids up for sure!  Good luck out there.

Just had to bring up the stain eh Cliff?? LOL.... now my blood is near boiling again... I have picked up some stuff that should do the trick... this stuff might eat a hole right through the floor! but should do the trick I hope..  Westley's Bleche-Wite  If this does not do it.... nothing will!  G....
Do I really need to ask about this? NA  Nice gesture my friend.

Great invite gerritt !!..well im sure that you will find some people who would love to go,i know myself & my family would,but im fishing in a few tourneys & have fish lake ontario for the salmon derby. well maybe next time bud...have a blast and have fun catching fish with the little guy !!!cheers

As was said,./,.... Great Gesture there Bud! I'd love to get back up there but we just cant do it....... Besides all else I've my addition to complete...and you know what thats like when your doing it alone... Anyone getting in on this is a lucky sod....... WTG G -pete
TTT
None is interested in @ week at Lakair??  ahh well more room in the boat for me! LOL   Can a mod move this to the hook-up section for me please  G
What are the dates G?
Nevermind I got them.

June 12th to 19th... however this may need to change.. a family meeting was held today @ the hospital concerning my wifes grandmother... they plan to remove her from life support... so as of right now the date is tentative..  Thinking of bringing up the family?  G
gotta check with the wife. i know this is a hard question to answer but do you know when you'll know the dates for sure?
I should know by the weekend.. we are working on getting the family assembled so everyone can say their final goodbyes.  G
thanks. G. Sorry to hear the bad news.
Hey Gerritt, sorry to hear about your wifes Grandmother, it's never an easy time.  When you know the dates, I might stop in for a day....can't spend the night though....  Maureen

Hi Gerritt sorry to hear about your wifes grand mother My son in law lost his last week sad news but we all have to go through it someday. Good news is we are up at Fairbanks that week and if possible I will try to drop over.Might be hard as we are looking after grandson that week.I would really like to check out Lakair as there is talk of a few days fishing in the fall.

I will be sure to let you guys know fr sure when I will be there! we would love a bit of company for the day evening lunch supper whatever!  Thanks for you're well wishes folks.. she truely is a remarkable woman and will be sorely missed...  G

Well, I am heading up Saturday Morning   ... Unfortunately the people that have PM'd me about this trip are no longer able to attend..  Fishing solo it is!  Unless someone can make it up on short notice.  Have a great week everyone! I will be sure to put the tripod in the boat and take as many pics as I can!  G
Have fun Gerritt and catch some monsters.  Take lots of pics.  Wish I could join you.  Sorry to hear about your wife's grandma.  Joey
I wish I could join you, if even for a couple of days.  I'll be fishing solo in a couple of weeks up there myself.  Have a great time, be safe, and looking forward to your report.
Don't catch them all Gerritt, leave some for me. Pics would be nice though.   Jeff.
